name: Raventure
description:
In Raventure, you play as a brave warrior on a perilous journey across a scorching desert.
Your mission is to find the legendary golden scarab, a precious artifact said to
has magical powers and can grant wishes.



However, the journey is treacherous as you must fight ferocious mummies and other mythical creatures,
who stand in your way. Armed with a magic wand, you must fend off these enemies and overcome difficult obstacles,
to reach your goal.


As you explore the endless desert, you will discover hidden treasures and secret passages that will aid you in your quest.
But be careful, mummies and other dangers will not make your mission easier.

Stunning graphics, addictive gameplay and gripping storyline, Raventure will take you
into a mystical world full of adventures and dangers.

Peculiarities:
- Nice nice graphics.
- Pumping system.
- Relaxing gameplay.
